Name: Martí's Martini
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Herbal, medium dry, rum-based, Martini-style drink.
History: Created in 2008 by Oli Gillespie at Bibendum Wine Ltd, London, England and named after José Martí (1853-1895) - a leader of the Cuban independence movement, writer and renowned poet.
Nutrition: One serving of Martí's Martini contains 157 calories
